original_text: He will be very important to the Lord God. So he will make you very happy. Many other people will also be very happy because he has been born. He must never drink anything with alcohol in it. From the time that he is born, the Holy Spirit will live inside him.
korean_text: 이는 그가 주 앞에 큰 자가 되며 포도주나 독한 술을 마시지 아니하며 모태로부터 성령의 충만함을 받아

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 매우 중요한 사람이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So he will make you very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 당신을 매우 기쁘게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Many other people will also be very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 다른 사람들도 매우 기쁠 것입니다
그는 절대 아무것도 마시면 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: From the time that he is born
the Holy Spirit will live inside him
